income_messages:
From: j**************d@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-20 19:25:55
SUBJECT: SCOTIA PRIVATE CLIENT GROUP
SCOTIA PRIVATE CLIENT GROUP
56-58 Richmond Street, Port of Spain
Tel/Fax +1-868-358-2022
Email 
jackson2hartford@gmail.com
Date 19TH April 2023
Attn. Beneficiary
This is to inform you that we have receive a draft and instruction from the ABSA bank
that is working with the bank in London. They request us to remit the draft to your
nominated bank account details .our team of Legal advisers has vetted a beneficiary ‘A’
status clearance, that certify you as the bona fide owner of the draft issued by the bank.
Under the instruction of the bank in London as reference above is the Subject. I was also
satisfied with the recommendation of the bank manager. Who called me personally and
asks me to assist you to Process the draft and remit the funds to your nominated bank
account. Our head office in Canada has mandated us, the regional office in Trinidad and
Tobago to handle your payment.
Kindly complete the attach processing bank form and return vie email, 
the bank will
require a valid proof of identification to set up an escrow account
 where this fund will
be deposited as the draft is expected to be process immediately.it will be secured in
escrow until you receive an onward transfer request, we will like you to reconfirm to us
the following to enable us know that we are dealing with the true beneficiary of this
fund. (1) Your valid identification, (2) the amount you are expecting The authorization
of subsequent transfer of funds to your nominated account will be Subjected to proper
validation and clearance bass on regulation of international credit and Payment
department (ICPD)
Please be guide accordingly
Thanks for choosing scotia bank our service are second to none.
Yours faithfully
JACKSON HARTFORD
[Director international remittance department)
From: j**************d@gmail.com

SUBJECT: Re: SCOTIA PRIVATE CLIENT GROUP
Thanks for your mail ,there is no risk involved as the fund is
legitimate and 100%risk free .the amount is $1.5m .all you need is to
complete the escrow account form that was sent to you and send it back to
us ,to enable us commence the process of transferring  the fund into your
nominated account in your country.for security reasons you are advise to
keep every information concerning this fund to yourself until the fund gets
into your nominated account in your country.attached is my work ID card
